title: Patch Notes
content: Dual Wielder passive. Fixed the listed location on savegames made at a certain point in High Hall suggesting you're still atop the Netherbrain. Fixed the Larian splash screen sometimes not appearing when launching the game. The 'Shared Stash' message now specifies whether a character is taking an item from the Traveller's Chest or from another party member.
